pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kcu![python_version](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=Python&message=3.5%20|%203.6%20|%203.7&color=blue) [![PyPI downloads/month](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/kcu?logo=pypi&logoColor=white)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/kcu)## Descriptionsome python utility methods that I often use compiled in a package## Install~~~~bashpip install kcu# orpip3 install kcu~~~~
